sentences.en: A brilliant shaft of sunlight burst through the doorway.
sentences.cn: 一束耀眼的阳光从门口照射进来。

sentences.en: A great epidemic burst forth in that area.
sentences.cn: 那个地区突然发生了一场大瘟疫。
活动 / 能量 / 怒火 / 热情的迸发

sentences.en: A water main burst and the street was flooded.
sentences.cn: 总水管破裂了，整条街道发了大水。

sentences.en: He burst into a high-pitched laugh, as though he'd said something funny.
sentences.cn: 他突然放声大笑，好像讲了什么好笑的事似的。

sentences.en: He burst into uncontrollable laughter at something I'd said.
sentences.cn: 听了我的话，他禁不住大笑起来。

sentences.en: He burst onto the fashion scene in the early 1980s.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代初他突然在时尚界活跃起来。

sentences.en: He trained his gun down and loosed a brief burst.
sentences.cn: 他用枪瞄准下面后，砰砰射出一串子弹。

sentences.en: Her burst of exuberance and her brightness overwhelmed me.
sentences.cn: 她勃发的热情和阳光的性格征服了我。

sentences.en: It is not a good idea to burst a blister.
sentences.cn: 把水泡挑破不是个好主意。

sentences.en: Rachel burst out as the door was flung open again.
sentences.cn: 当门被再次猛地推开时，雷切尔冲了出去。

sentences.en: She burst into tears and ran from the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 她突然哭了，跑出了厨房。

sentences.en: The avenues lined with jacaranda trees burst into a carnival of purple.
sentences.cn: 大街的两旁种着蓝花楹，绽放的花朵汇成一片紫色的海洋。

sentences.en: The door burst open and an angry young nurse appeared.
sentences.cn: 门突然被推开，一名怒气冲冲的年轻护士出现在门口。

sentences.en: The door burst open and Tom ran into the room.
sentences.cn: 门突然打开，汤姆跑进了房间。

sentences.en: The jet burst into flames and plummeted to the ground.
sentences.cn: 这架喷气式飞机突然着火，急速坠地。

sentences.en: The pipes had burst and the house was under two feet of water.
sentences.cn: 水管爆裂，房子被水淹了两英尺。

sentences.en: The plane then flipped over and burst into flames.
sentences.cn: 接着飞机突然翻转并燃起了大火。

sentences.en: The river burst its banks, submerging an entire village.
sentences.cn: 河水决堤，淹没了整个村庄。

trans.tran_cn: （使）爆裂，爆炸，冲，闯，突然出现，充满
